org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield
Class ForceField

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.GeometricMinimizer
      org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.ForceField

public class ForceField
extends GeometricMinimizer

To work with the coordinates of the molecule, like get the 3d coordinates of the atoms or calculate the distance between two atoms.

vlabarta
